document_data.mainbody:
The springs of Donto Yeudo was a mythical location said to lie on the island of Saishu, off the coast of Koryo in northeast Kara-Tur.It is unknown if "Donto Yeudo" is a person, place, or something else.
The springs of Donto Yeudo were one of the local legends that Dan Zor, the former king and governor of Saishu, wished to investigate. By 1357 DR, he sought adventurers who could find the mythical springs for him.
